document_data.mainbody:
wererabbit was type of lycanthrope that could take the form of a rabbit or a rabbit-like humanoid hybrid. They existed on Toril and in the Domains of Dread, though like all lycanthropes derived from prey animals they were very rare.
Ravenlofts famed monster hunter, Rudolph van Richten, once dismissed the existence of wererabbits in his seminal work Van Richtens Guide to Werebeasts. Therein he stated that they and any other lycanthropes derived from herbivores were merely figments of imagination, born by hallucinations and drunkards.
